text:
Not a gamer, but came across this game and started nerding allll out on it. Really cool that it’s taking true cel-animated content and applying it to live gameplay. Knowing how difficult it is to move beyond programmatic animation in digital media I am enamored by this.

<http://www.traditionalanimation.com/2016/max-fleischer-style-game-cuphead-coming-to-xboxone/>

attachments.title: Max Fleischer Style Game “Cuphead” Coming to XboxOne
attachments.text: New Max Fleischer 1930s style game coming to XboxOne and Steam for Microsoft Windows called “Cuphead”. This game definitely looks amazing, the characters and animation are all done traditionally. I am personally looking forward to playing this game, it is a good thing I own an XboxOne. You can’t get
attachments.fallback: Traditional Animation: Max Fleischer Style Game “Cuphead” Coming to XboxOne

text: For further nerding out, here is the nice, long, geeky interview post scripted to the above article: <http://time.com/4123150/cuphead-preview/>

attachments.title: Exclusive: See How <em>Cuphead</em>‘s Incredible Cartoon Graphics Are Made
attachments.text: A behind-the-scenes look at the most visually innovative video game in years
